column7: Instruction in essential skills in business communication both in academic and professional settings; skills covered include business proposals, synthesizing sources, and participating in group discussions. 0 graduate hours. No professional credit. Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated in separate terms. Prerequisite: Level 2 course placement results on the English Placement Test. ESL students only.
